name: Droplet (Asher-Robertson)
description:
DROPLET

Description: Take a journey through the water cycle as Droplet, a young Raindrop ready to leave her mark on the outside world. Combine the unique properties of water with the environment around you to find your flow to get around, over, and through the various obstacles that stand in your way!

CONTROLLER REQUIRED

Background: The goal of this project was to deliver a cathartic narrative through gameplay and level design. This project was designed and developed solely by Asher Robertson over the course of 4 months during his Junior year at DigiPen Institute of Technology.
